entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -40.7°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
